Name: Kids Empire Salt Lake City
Description: A cozy, all-weather play stop for families in Salt Lake City that’s designed to feel welcoming for little ones and easy for grown-ups. Perfect for burning off energy when the weather won’t cooperate.
Pricing: Check venue website for current pricing; locations may vary by age and day of week.
Grip Socks Required?: Likely yes – check venue website to confirm.
Age Range Suitability: Good for toddlers and elementary-age kids (roughly 1–10 years old).

Grip Socks Required?: Likely yes – check venue website to confirm.
